page.title: 14SYKE COMMON
page.content: The chief attractions of Syke Common are the ponds.One small pond has been made for small children to paddle in.The larger pond is a popular place for sailing model boats, but is especially good for tadpoles. Syke Common is a good place for children to play safely.Anyone may play there and activities range from horse riding to kite flying.Frogs have been seen living in deep horseshoe impressions left in the mud.There are many public footpaths in the Syke area which give short cuts through fields and through the housing estates on the perimeter of the common. Syke is very close to the moors and so many walkers use Syke as an access point to an area of local charm and beauty.
